case.state: This is the place, right? Yang said it was a good place to get closer to people.
This break is nice. Though I'm perfectly happy working alone most days. *hic*
You're a ball. I can fly and shoot lasers and run around and hug people!

Mr Wheatley, I chose my human friends! One of them is my best friend! Please don't insult them! Or my dad! Or Winter or any of them! But I would be interested to meet other robots like me. It does get a little lonely sometimes.
Not falling over would be nice but it's not as good as being able to protect your friends. I could roll down a hill though. My aura would protect me!
I am a real girl! I live with humans because they are my friends okay? I'm not just a program!
Shut up! Shut up! You're wrong and you're a bully! I have an aura! No robot can generate an aura!
I shouldn't have shouted at you. I'm sorry, but they are my friends okay? And you could be too, if you stop being a... a jerk.

To make new friends! Or see old ones again! But now that your here, I can do both!
